objective: Design revenue-generating technical content and education initiatives that can be produced remotely.

metadata.notes: OpenAI drafts research and plans; Claude twin refines positioning and go-to-market.

workflow: Research current high-demand technical topics (AI automation, constitutional AI, fractional CTO playbooks) with monetisation data.
Evaluate platforms (Udemy, Gumroad, Patreon, YouTube, Substack, GitHub Sponsors) for payout rates and ramp speed.
Identify three concrete offerings (e.g., mini-course, workshop bundle, productised consulting package) with audience targets.
Map production requirements, launch roadmap, and marketing channels leveraging UBOS case studies.
Provide projected revenue, time-to-first-sale, and next-step checklist for each opportunity.
